Natural Light: Utilizing windows and skylights to let in as much natural light as possible during the day, then closing them to trap the light inside the room.
Solar Lights: Installing solar-powered LED lights that charge during the day and provide illumination at night, a sustainable and eco-friendly option.
String Lights: Hanging fairy or string lights from the ceiling or around the room can create a cozy and whimsical ambiance.
Glow-in-the-Dark Accents: Adding glow-in-the-dark paint or decals to walls, furniture, or decorative items can create a unique and mystical glow.
LED Light Panels: Installing LED light panels on walls or ceilings can provide a modern and minimalist lighting solution, while also serving as a decorative element.
